entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -22.4°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening and before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15 with temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15 with temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 07 January 2023
